drupal_request.title: Drupal Request Format
drupal_request.description: A log record following Acquia's Drupal Request log file format.

default.pattern: ^\[(?<timestamp>\d{2}/\w{3}/\d{4}:\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2} [+-]?\d{4})\] (?<host>[\w\-\.]+) (?<method>GET|POST|) (?<url>\S+) http_code=(?<http_code>\d{3}|) query=(?<query>\S*) uid=(?<uid>\d+|na) php_pid=(?<php_pid>\d+) php_time=(?<php_time>\d+\.?\d*) queue_wait=(?<queue_wait>-?\d+) request_id="(?<request_id>[\w-]+)"

sample.line: [02/Nov/2016:17:05:10 +0000] test.local  / http_code= query= uid=0 php_pid=8584 php_time=8.245 queue_wait=-1 request_id="-"
[02/Nov/2016:17:03:10 +0000] test.local GET /home http_code=200 query= uid=0 php_pid=8423 php_time=0.708 queue_wait=0 request_id="v-3ba0ac8e-a11e-11e6-b192-12ab7d2b3029"

[14/Oct/2016:06:05:36 +0000] test.local GET /my-account/billing-and-payments http_code=200 query= uid=340116 php_pid=18704 php_time=6.948 queue_wait=0 request_id="bbdc3e24-0467-4341-898f-081d0db18dee"

[02/Nov/2016:17:12:42 +0000] test.local GET /user/reset/416/1478105274/3GDUnT6JcrZVUyOS5iWZxbsRDDH7x_kbrf1VwSpXghU/brief?utm_source=reset-password-link&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=reset-password http_code=200 query=utm_source=reset-password-link&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=reset-password uid=0 php_pid=8985 php_time=5.352 queue_wait=0 request_id="69cef295-f016-41df-99b8-92b31047e4af"

Oct  9 06:28:51 test-server test.local: https://test.local|1475994531|php|2.2.2.2|https://test.local/user/register|https://test.local/|0||Warning: Creating default object from empty value in test_preprocess_page() (line 241 of /mnt/www/html/test/docroot/sites/all/themes/test/template.php). request_id="77ad1e45-0f38-4fd8-816f-4c77d9f870ae"
